name: n8n-multi-environment
description: Helper scripts for n8n multi-environment architecture

scripts.export: echo 'Exporting workflows...' && mkdir -p workflows && docker exec -it n8n-n8n-1 n8n export:workflow --all --output=/files/workflows/ && mv local-files/workflows/*.json workflows/ && echo '✅ Workflows exported to workflows/ directory'
scripts.validate: for f in workflows/*.json; do echo "Validating $f" && cat "$f" | jq empty || exit 1; done && echo '✅ All workflows are valid JSON'
